text: Ezɨ Devit uamategha uan dɨpenimɨn ghugha, uan ikɨzim deragh me damuasa, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn azangasava ami. Ezɨ Solɨn guivim Mikal dɨpenim ategha azenan iza Devit mɨgɨa ghaze, “Ame, Israelian atrivim uan ziar ekiam akakagha, bibiamra bar deraghavɨra uabɨ fakuri. Ezɨ an ingangarir gumazir dapanibar, ingangarir amizir kɨniba bar an gani. Nɨn arazir kam, mati gumazir nɨghnɨzir aghuiba puvatɨzim amir arazim.”
